data.title: Tesla Board Probed Allegation That Musk Pushed Employee
data.text: Apr.05 -- Tesla Inc.'s board conducted a probe into allegations that Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk pushed an employee, according to a statement issued to Bloomberg by Tesla's board.

data.title: Updated Tesla Price Trends: Former Hot Stock Does Slow Fade
data.text: With Elon Musk back in the news this week, here's a look at Tesla price charts in several different time frames.

data.title: Tesla Deliveries Up 110% From Last Year
data.text: Tesla's stock dropped 8% yesterday on the news that Q1 deliveries fell 31% from the previous quarter but up 110% from last year. From the one year perspective, Tesla is the only car company that is growing.

data.title: Elon Musk: Self-driving Teslas are going to make their owners money by competing with Uber, Lyft
data.text: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the cars are already built with the hardware they'll need.

data.title: Elon Musk says, "American justice system and judge are outstanding'
data.text:
Tesla CEO Elon Musk arrives at New York Federal Court to face allegations by the SEC that he is in contempt of court for violating an agreement because of tweets that he sent.

“I’m very happy with the results and very impressed with Judge Nathan’s analysis,” Musk told reporters after a nearly two-hour hearing during which Musk’s and SEC lawyers argued whether Musk should be held in contempt.

data.title: Elon Musk and the SEC have two weeks to settle their differences
data.text: Alexis Keenan of Yahoo Finance reports on Elon Musk's Federal court appearance yesterday in New York to address allegations by the SEC that he was in contempt of court.

data.title: Short Sellers Earn $770M In Profit From Tesla Deliveries Miss
data.text: Tesla, Inc. shares were bouncing back a bit Friday after an 8.2-percent drop Thursday following a major first-quarter deliveries miss.

data.title: Cramer: The Musk court ruling was 'a total slap-down of the SEC'
data.text: Tesla's Elon Musk appeared in court on Thursday where the judge ordered the S.E.C. and Musk to try to come to an agreement outside of the courtroom.

data.title: Judge Dismisses Elon Musk Contempt Claims, Orders Revision Of Settlement Addressing SEC Concerns
data.text: Tesla Inc investors prepared for the worst when CEO Elon Musk and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission delivered oral arguments in a Thursday contempt hearing.

data.title: Here's a recap of Tesla CEO Elon Musk's face off with the SEC in court
data.text: Tesla's Elon Musk appeared in court on Thursday to address the charges the S.E.C. had filed against him over his use of Twitter.
